# Otherworldly Amalgamation

The amalgamated essence of other dimesnions, it pulses with dark energy. Used with a Timetorn Sigil to create the Necro Paragon armor.

[Back to Items](../items.md)

- **ID**: 17775
- **Name**: Otherworldly Amalgamation
- **Description**: The amalgamated essence of other dimesnions, it pulses with dark energy. Used with a Timetorn Sigil to create the Necro Paragon armor.
